value:
Askr has so many herbs! I've never
seen that one before...or that one...
Don't worry, I won't wander too far!

I grew up in the Deeprealms far away
from my father. There I studied
apothecary so I could help people.

Talk to me if you're ever hurt or
feeling down! I'll figure out the best
way to treat your troubles.

I stumbled on some rare plants and
made this medicine. C'mon and try
some, $Nu!

Here's a charm to ward off injuries.
The best kind of medicine is not
having to use any at all!

I'm Midori. Are you feeling OK?
I come with herbs and medicine
from $Nf's castle.
Hooray! I worked really hard!
I've got a great idea for a new recipe!
I won't let this get me down!

I'm getting stronger! Maybe now I can
prove my usefulness to Father.

Hi there. I'm Midori, the biggest
herb gatherer around! It's nice
to meet you.

Medicines are amazing, huh? A simple
salve can help a patient feel much
better...and treat them quickly too!$k$pBut, it makes me sad that some
wounds have no cure at all.
Like a pained heart.$k$pCombat doesn't just hurt physically, it
takes its toll little by little...$k$pThat's why I want to put an end to
fighting so no one suffers anymore.$k$pPromise we'll build a peaceful world
together, $Nu?
(exertion)
Now!
Ow...
(exertion)
I'm onto you!
Hey! Be nice!
I'm not scared!
Pick on someone your own size!
D-did I...help...?
*giggle*
Nice to meet you! Do you know Kaze? He's my father!
H-hey! I don't sneak up on you, do I?!
I don't like to keep Father waiting!
I'm all grown-up now, you know!
If you're ever feeling under the weather, just let me know and I'll make you some medicine!
I wish I could spend more time with Father...
I'm so happy we were able to meet and become friends!
Sure!
Hmm...
Let me help!
